When using the Steam API, this function can be called to check that the Steam client API has correctly initialised the statistics for your game.

{ANY_CODE} global.steam_api = false;
if steam_initialised()
{nbsp_x4}{
{nbsp_x4}if steam_stats_ready() && steam_is_overlay_enabled()
{nbsp_x8}{
{nbsp_x8}global.steam_api = true;
{nbsp_x8}}
{nbsp_x4}}

The above code will set a global variable to <tt>true</tt> if the Steam client API is correctly initialised, along with the Steam statistics and overlay functionality, or it will set the variable to <tt>false</tt> otherwise.
